data.text:
View salary at Niantic by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Niantic jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Niantic. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Chief of Staff, Product Management jobs at Niantic earn the most with an average annual salary of $299,006, while Animator jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $67,069.

The estimate average salary for Niantic employees is around $137,626 per year, or the hourly rate of Niantic rate is $66. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $155,194. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.
